articles.description: Amanda Anisimova deals out more Grand Slam heartbreak to Aryna Sabalenka as she books her place in the Wimbledon final.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: Amanda Anisimova stuns Aryna Sabalenka to reach final

articles.description: England face India in the third Test at Lord's - follow live scores, radio commentary, video highlights and updates.
articles.title: England vs India cricket LIVE: Third Test, day one, Lord's - scores, commentary, highlights & updates

articles.description: Ireland's Ben Healy produces a stunning solo break to win stage six of the Tour de France while Mathieu van der Poel regains the race leader's yellow jersey.
articles.title: Tour de France 2025 results: Ben Healy wins stage six as Mathieu van der Poel regains overall lead

articles.description: After Christian Horner's departure, we analyse whether four-time world champion Max Verstappen is now more likely to remain at Red Bull.
articles.title: Christian Horner: Max Verstappen more likely to stay at Red Bull now?

articles.description: Tottenham open talks with Nottingham Forest over a possible £60m move for Morgan Gibbs-White.
articles.title: Morgan Gibbs-White: Tottenham in talks to sign Nottingham Forest midfielder

articles.description: AC Milan's Serie A match against Como in February could become the first European league fixture to be played abroad after plans to host the fixture in Australia are announced.
articles.title: First European league fixture to be played abroad? AC Milan v Como Serie A fixture could be played in Australia

articles.description: Double Olympic champion Caster Semenya wins a partial victory at the European Court of Human Rights in her long legal battle over athletics' sex eligibility rules.
articles.title: Caster Semenya: South African double Olympic champion wins partial victory at European Court of Human Rights in her long legal battle over athletics' sex eligibility rules.

articles.description: England's Charley Hull withdraws from the Evian Championship during the first round because of illness.
articles.title: Evian Championship: Charley Hull withdraws with illness

articles.description: Owen Farrell is named on the bench for the British and Irish Lions' final tour match before the start of the Test series against Australia.
articles.title: British and Irish Lions: Owen Farrell named on bench for AUNZ fixture

articles.description: Julian Cash and Lloyd Glasspool become the first all-British pairing to reach the men's doubles final at Wimbledon in the Open era with victory over Marcel Granollers and Horacio Zeballos.
articles.title: Wimbledon 2025 results: Julian Cash and Lloyd Glasspool make history to reach Wimbledon final
